Package main

Class Launch

java.lang.Object
main.Launch
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class Launch extends Object implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
This class is the main class of the program. It is being executed upon launch, and it calls all the other classes based on the state of the program

    • render

      public void render​(float delta)
      Calls all the classes and functions necessary for the simulation, based on the state of the program. This method keeps on running in a loop as long as the program has not been terminated.
      Specified by:
